name: PASVAN
description:
Pasvan is First Person game
There are traps..illusions and tips in Gaman..

Story

Gaman is a place that dark,dangerous and life zone of Gagama !
You will open your eyes in galactic labyrint..
if you wanna escape from here,you should think 'unexpected' one.
